t: Amazon.com : TERRO Liquid Ant Killer ll T200, 2 oz : Home Pest Lures : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: Ants can be a problem anywhere – in the home, at work and everywhere in between. To kill common household ants, place TERRO Liquid Ant Killer in areas where you've seen ant activity. As the bait circulates through the colony, it kills the ants you see and the ones you don’t.
